column4: hello all---it looks like my xen kernel doesnt recognized boot=/dev/sda1 as a valid partition or somthing because on boot it says to check the boot= line of my menu.lst.. my default kernel recognizes it fine ...does this indicate that somehow ide isnt supported in the kernel or the ext3 file system
or am i missing somthing simple?
my relavant boot line is module          /boot/vmlinuz-2.6.16-rc5 root=/dev/hda1 ro console=tty0
